law.catch_line: Evidence to be considered in determining the best interest of a child.

text.section: In determining the best interest of the child, the court may consider the effectiveness of rehabilitative efforts made by the parent or caretaker intended to address circumstances in this section.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 140, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 18, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 7, effective March 17, 1998.
